I saw something fly past our trailer park very low

content.detailedDescription: I am sorry but most of the foregoing is false. i am an internationally-publishedcultural anthropologist researching the diffusion in ancient times of t-shapedtemples and tombs (a global phenomenon). a report reached me concerning thesighting in bangalore earlier this year (i think) of a t-shaped ufo seen by twoengineers from a rooftop. can you confirm? this is the only way i could think ofto ask this question, so i hope you wont be too put out. also, i was told thata lady reported being abducted and had some small t-shaped objects removed fromher foot on tv (perhaps on sightings). can you confirm? once again, im sorry todeceive you but perhaps you will recognize the implications if t-shaped ufosexist and are flying over a planet fairly bristling with t-shaped ancienttemples...................................  todd greaves, early sites researchsociety.-
content.summary: T-shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: It was near dusk, clear skies. my girlfriend was looking at the moon and i sawthis small silver object. she call me outside where we observed it moving in astraight line until it was obscured by trees.  it was a distant silver disk, butvery small.  we would not have seen it unless observing the moon at that moment.It did not appear to be an aircraft of any type.  we live near a major airportand an airbase.  we never observer aircraft overhead except small private craft. it was not a baloon, as it traveled in a straight line at a constant speed. iwould have to imagine that this craft was large at an extreme altitude, inexcess of 40,000. there were no contrails. in addition, the following night, perhaps, an hour later we saw a point of lightabout the same size.  it was traveling north to south directly overhead.  again,we never see community or military traffic overhead.
content.summary: High altitude silver disk. 19:56 5/21/02 over sout

content.detailedDescription: 1.I was playing paper dolls on the back porch thetop half of the porch was screen.The light had blown out so i was sitting in thearea were the kitchen light was shining so i could see. 2. the whole porch gotbright i turned to the light and it was right there. 3. i didnt know what itwas never saw one. 4.I was excited i called to my granny come see the prettylights thats when she got upset and then i was afraid. 5.It was a saucer typewith lights that spin or appear to spin. 6.I thought it was going to land iscreamed and thats all i remember it just disappeared i was outside at thistime. we left the house and ran the street with others. please call me  thankyou, dina bowen
content.summary: I was about 5 years old i saw a ufo in bayou la ba

content.detailedDescription: i was driving down a semirural road when my carstalled.  i saw three cigar shaped objects in the distance.  one of the objectsbroke off from the group and decended to earth.  at this point my companionsmemory went blank.  she just sat in the car.  an earthlike being that glowedcame up to my car and opened the door.  i suffered a memory lapse and when iawoke i was in a room on a table.  i lapsed out again and when i awoke i was onthe ground in front of my car when the object again became airborne.  it was aterrifying experience that i cant believe i am sharing it with anyone.
content.summary: I spotted a cigar shaped object and made contact

content.detailedDescription: We were walking one evening sometime in either jan or feb of 2002, behindchesterfield mall. it was about 2100 and a clear night.  i noticed three lightsapproaching out of the west heading from the general area of spirit of st louistowards downtown, roughly parallel with highway 40.  the lights were flying in atriangular pattern, with one in front and two in the rear.  they were flashingtogether, and the distance between them never changed.  i assumed it was only athousand feet high or so, because of the size.  i guessed it was about the samealtitude as other planes that approach or depart spirit.  however, there wasabsoloutely no noise at all.  the lights glided from west to east and finallydisappeared towards lambert.  if the object was any convential aircraft that washigh enough in altitude to be out of earshot, it would have had to be the sizeof an aircraft carrier.
content.summary: Triangular lights.

content.detailedDescription: We were watching a movie on television when we saw a cylindrical object outsidethe window. it was moving back and forth in the sky, which is why we noticed it.We first thought it was a plane. we went outside to see what it was and it camedown about 25 feet from the house in the pasture. we underwent hypnosis anddiscovered that an alien named zim and his robot gir abducted us, ate ourbrains, and forced us to eat poop brand candy bars.
content.summary: Abducted

content.detailedDescription: just finished dinner with workmates,walking to carthrough carpark,out of the corner of my eye i saw something about the same timeas everyone else,it was 2 orange/yellow oval shapes coming from thesouth,slowing down together in the sky, stopped almost above us then slowly theone in the west turned 90degrees, paused, then together they shot out to theeast accelerating faster than anything known should, in size they were each atleast coke bottle top size, there were reports a week later on the local radioand mydate has a 5 day error margin(sorry)
content.summary: 2 orange oval lights in parallel, slowed,stopped,t
Cluster of stars in a triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: On 5/15/02, 10:35 pm, my 7 yr old son and i were laying out on our front deck.We we counting satellites and meteorites. laying flat on our backs lookingstraight up, i first observed what was a pulsating satellite. i have seen manysatellites in my time, but this was new to me. then within a minute or so, iobserved out of nowhere either the same, or a new object light up brighter thanany other star directly above our heads, then fade. then a few degrees se, itlit up again, this time getting my boys attention. it again faded, and movedagian a few degrees s and faded, not to be seen again. this scared my boy, as wethen went inside, and i am now reporting to you. i have lived near the beale afbflightline, and this is the second encounter in 3 years and i cannot sit backand say everything is ok! its not, and i know what we saw! suggestions?
content.summary: Pulsing objects over n. california

content.detailedDescription: There were around 25 white pinpoint lights that ping-ponged in the sky in onegeneral area. then a green pinpoint light appeared and a green beam shotperfectly straight to the ground. a few seconds later another green lightappeared and a green beam shot horizontilly across the sky. after a few moreminutes of the white lights bouncing around, they just disappeared.
content.summary: Small white lights,green lights with straight offs
Strange lights over swamp
Sighting from 1997

content.detailedDescription: On april 10, 2002 at 5:30 a.M. cdt the witness arose and went downstairs to thekitchen and opened the blinds to look for deer on the lake on her and herhusbands property. the weather was clear. she saw a bronze metallicoctagon-shaped object about 20 feet across which seemed to float on the lake.The object had darker bronze circles around a central raised portion and anextension that appeared to have windows on it.  she moved to the glass door fora better view and to make sure that what she saw wasnt a reflection orillusion.  she heard no sound but watched the object for about a minute, thenran upstairs to call her husband to look.  by the time the two returned theobject had disappeared.  the water on the lake did not seem disturbed.
content.summary: Ufo on lake in tennessee

content.detailedDescription: It was a loud, scary noise and it flew by very quickly.  i had just gotten homefrom work when i saw it fly by.  i first noticed the object because of theamount of light it produced and the noise it made  i thought it was a weatherbaloon, but soon realized that it was not.  i was hot, disoriented, and dazed asit flew by, like it affected me.  it just flew by very fast, maybe 300mph.  ilost sight when it just dissapeared along the horizon.  i was  really scared.
content.summary: Silver, bright, hovering disk.
Central kanas 1975

content.detailedDescription: was outside after dark, dry fork rd. nearharrison, oh. bright ruby red light flash, filled eyes. two stars over indiana.Went in, got witness two andhis 5 children. red flash again after he said i wascrazy. observed for 10minutes. two air force fighters came from behind, overi-275, at treetoplevel,(loud!) booking for the lights. small overcab-wingspotter followed inbetween space of jets. left light took off up 45 deg.Angle,left light trail like a meteor. right light dimmer than left, got bright,moved,dimmed, bright, moved, dim, then bright and shot off opposite diectionlike ameteor. jets split up in pursuit, but they were way outclassed. spotterplane kept going straight to original spot, he was outclassed by all aircraftinvolved (like, he was left standing still. witness two now a beliver, thereswild stuff goes on in the night!
content.summary: Two stars over indiana, observed from ohio border

content.detailedDescription: Myself and michael were camping in the castleraegh river bed (it was dry).Theobject was cigar shaped, a row of slow flashing large white lights on top(maybe6)and smaller coloured ones of varying colour flashing intermittently.It movedroughly zig zag towards us and stopped maybe 200m. away then lifted accross ourpath(maybe 60deg)to about 12 oclock then shot almost straight out until itdisappeared.When it lifted it would have moved at incredible speed.
content.summary: A long narrow form with 2 rows of flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: My mom was sleeping on our back screened-in porch on a summer night.  she wasawakened from sleep, but not because of any sound or light.  she immediatelyobserved a three pointed craft, hovering at treetop level in the southeaternsky. she observed absolutely no sound.  she knew immediately that it was not aconventional aircraft, as the craft was hovering, emitted no engine sound, andhad no blinking lights.  there was one steady white light at each corner of thecraft, and a black triangle-shaped expanse in between.  the craft was verylarge, and blocked out starlight.  the craft then moved slowly to the west, anddropped out of sight behind the trees in the southeastern sky.  she reportedthis to the three of us the next morning.  we all remember this event to thisday.
content.summary: Black triangle seen in fulton co.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were laying on our backs in a vacant field next tour our house,resting after playing some football.  it was a late summer-time dusk.  we bothobserved a three pointed craft, moving from south to north at a steady speed andwithout sound.  our first thought was that it was a conventional aircraft. however, there were no blinking lights, such as one would expect on an aircraft,and no engine sound whatsoever.  there was one steady white light at each cornerof the craft, and a black triangle-shaped expanse in between.  as the craftpassed under a star, the stars light was blocked out.  the craft disappearedfrom view on the northern horizon.  we went home and reported this sighting toour parents.  both of us remember this event to this day, as do our parents.
content.summary: Black triangles seen in fulton co.

content.detailedDescription: Witness replies to form 1 questions:she states she was driving home when she noticed some bright lights, which atfirst looked like an airplane flying too low.  she watched to see if it was introuble or going to crash. she slowed down (10-15 mph) and was trying to figureout why an airplane would be in that particular place, flying so low and movingso slow.  using a lamppost for a guide she decided it was not moving at all soher next thought was that it was some sort of light tower.  she states that sheknew that it could not be a tower in that particular place and then she thoughtufo.  she stated that cars were driving by quickly and she wondered why theywere not slowing down to see what this object was.  as she got right next to it,she pulled into the parking lot of an abandoned gas station so she could lookright up at it.  she opened up her car door to ascertain if there was any noiseand all she could hear was the noise from the road.  when she opened up her doorit made a sharp turn to the west.  she followed it with her eyes for a fewblocks and the lost sight of it.  she then drove on a road going west but neversaw it again.  the clock in her car stated 8:48 p.M. she states the object was solid and shiny.  it had very bright white lights in acircle with red lights in the middle of the white lights.  it seemed to behovering until i opened my door and then made a sharp turn to the west and movedsmoothly and quickly away.
content.summary: Low flying shiny metallic object seen in east lans

content.detailedDescription: From fi report:the night was warm and hazy, very high humidity.  mr. _____ heard noises andthought someone was moving around in his basement, so he went there to check. he saw no one.  his german shepherd dog was barking, whining and acting as if anintruder was outside, so mr. _____ thought the noises were coming from someonearound his vehicle.  he went outside to check at 12:18 a.M. he saw no one, butthen saw a large round white light in the southeastern sky.  it was not movingat the time, so he went into the house for his 7x35 sears binoculars. (578 at1,000 yds.)  he said to his wife, "get up, you have to see this!"the light was dimmed (by the haze?) but with the naked eye it appeared the sizeof an orange held at arms length and through the binoculars it filled half thefield of vision.  if the house lights and yard light had been on, the lightcouldnt have been seen.They called their neighbor, ________ who came out and also viewed the objectthrough the binoculars.  they all agreed there were three rows of rectangularlime-green lights for a total of 12 lights.The object remained in the same place for 20 minutes without moving, then thegreen lights went out.  _____ told investigator that when the green lights wentout, they saw a little red light under the white object and slightly to theright.  the object started to move in an erratic pattern, described by the 3witnesses as a "sky show".  they said during the acrobatics which continueduntil about 1:30 a.M., the object made movements at various times as shown bythe sketch included within the report.  it would often stop and hover.  they estimated its closest point about a mileaway and they could hear a pulsating humming sound as it moved through thepatterns,which was alternately louder and softer.  the white light appeared to bebrighter in the center than at the edges, but he haze made it difficult toperceive any details.  mr. _______ called the lansing capitol city airport andcontrol reported nothing on their radar.At about 1:30 a.M. an officer from the sheriffs department arrived and saw theobject at a great distance (estimated 3 to 5 miles), then watched it as it camecloser and moved back again.  he admitted he didnt know what it was, butwouldnt identify it as a ufo.
content.summary: Rectangular lights, strange maneuvers in mason, mi
I saw a metallic object the shape of a chinese lan

content.detailedDescription: we were standing outside in our driveway lookingat the stars and current planet alignment, when my wife noticed what firstappeared to be two bright star-like objects moving through the sky. calling myattention to them, we observed the objects move at a high rate of speed fromsouthwest to northeast maintaining formation throughout. the lead object was ata slightly lower altitude (estimated to be about 1-2 thousand feet, andmaintained a lead of about 1-2 thousand feet throughout the sighting. theobjects made no sound whatsoever. i have been an aviation enthusiast and amatueraviation historian for over 30 years, and consider this event to be outside therealm of conventional aircraft performance. the objects faded from view into thedistant northeastern horizon.
content.summary: Silent steady lights flying in formation

content.detailedDescription: went back again tonight and saw 3 objects withpulsatings lights and erractic movements - first one was brighter than the other2 and it came the north going toward the south and then went out - the other 2came from the east and was traveling toward the west and also they went out ,allways like it knows someone is watching them and it happens on a nightly basis, from 9 pm on is the times we have observed them, and we are interested infinding out what they are and where they are coming from because it couldnt bea normal airplane and or swamp gas
content.summary: Bouncing blinking lights that also travel normal a
Large black triangle

content.detailedDescription: We were standing on the beach and i looked up and i saw a light that at first ithought was a satellite moving in an easterly direction. i told my friends tolook up and we all saw the first light moving in an easterly direction anddebated about it being a satellite when we saw it jump and zigzag. it was movingfaster than satellite and disappeared in the direction it was going as if itwere leaving the earths atmosphere and going out to space. my friends notedthat it looked like it was floating in an easterly direction. then there wasanother on a different path moving in a similar pattern only more jumpy andzigzagging. then there were two more each on a different path but going in thesame direction and moving in the same manner.
content.summary: Four lighted objects moving eastward sighted over.

content.detailedDescription: i was walking across the street when somethingjust seemed to attract my attention. i looked up and saw what i thought at firtwas a bundle of baloons.It was obviously not a  aircraft or helicopter. but itwas windy that morning and at first it was stationary. once it began to move itstarted doing rotations and i could see it was totally flat, that to me ruledout balloons.I watched it for a few minutes until it just vanished. my feelingswere i saw something else. i reported another sighting to mufon a few years backout of houston texas. i reported under my first name bradley heath jones.
content.summary: Saw object flat as a pancake moving thru the sky

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting outside relaxing from the days heat.About 10:00 at night. mychild saw it first and said to the effect.Look! do you see that!Pointing to thesky. as we looked to her directing.We saw an amazing thing.Oh, it was beautifulwith all those pastel lights.It just set up there for about ten minutes and thenwent strait up and disapeared from sight.I would say it was about the size ofsoft ball at arms distance.It was just houvering about ten oclock n.E. of us.
content.summary: At night, we saw a space ship up in the dark sky,
